description: This Musk Sticks Margarita Recipe is perfect for the&nbsp;party this season. It has just enough alcohol to keep you cool but not too much that you can't enjoy yourself all day long!
name: Musk Sticks Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Mix the tequila with the musk sticks and cover for 23 to 48 hours in a jar. Make sure to shake it occasionally.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix the tequila with the musk sticks and cover for 23 to 48 hours in a jar. Make sure to shake it occasionally.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, 30 ml rose liqueur, 15 ml lime juice, and a 60 ml musk mix. Shake vigorously.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, 30 ml rose liqueur, 15 ml lime juice, and a 60 ml musk mix. Shake vigorously.

recipeInstructions.name: Wet the glass rim with the lime wedge and coat the rim with sugar and pink salt mixture.
recipeInstructions.text: Wet the glass rim with the lime wedge and coat the rim with sugar and pink salt mixture.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the musk tequila into the glass. Garnish as desired and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the musk tequila into the glass. Garnish as desired and serve.
